mapper.select: /* CloseStoreMapper.getVanComboList */ SELECT '' AS VALUE , '전체' AS NAME FROM DUAL UNION SELECT VAN_CD AS VALUE , VAN_NM AS NAME FROM TB_CM_VAN_CMPNY WHERE VAN_FG = '01' ORDER BY VALUE NULLS FIRST

/* USE : CloseStoreMapper.getCloseStoreList */
SELECT A.HQ_OFFICE_CD, B.HQ_OFFICE_NM, A.STORE_CD, A.STORE_NM, A.AGENCY_CD, C.AGENCY_NM, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE((SELECT MAX(SALE_DATE) FROM TB_SL_DAILY_TOTAL WHERE HQ_OFFICE_CD = A.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND STORE_CD = A.STORE_CD), 'yyyymmdd'), 'yyyy-mm-dd') AS MAX_SALE_DATE, TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.REG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DT, A.SYS_STAT_FG, A.VAN_CD
FROM TB_MS_STORE A, TB_HQ_OFFICE B, TB_CM_AGENCY C WHERE B.HQ_OFFICE_CD = A.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND C.AGENCY_CD = A.AGENCY_CD
AND A.SYS_STAT_FG NOT IN ('2','9') AND A.REG_DT <= TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{startMonth},'YYYYMM') , -3),'YYYYMMDD') AND A.STORE_CD NOT IN ( SELECT DISTINCT STORE_CD FROM TB_SL_MONTHLY_TOTAL TSMT WHERE SALE_YM >= TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#{startMonth},'YYYYMM') , -1),'YYYYMM') ) AND A.STORE_CD NOT IN ( SELECT STORE_CD FROM TB_MS_STORE_CLOSE_EXCEPT )
--AND A.STORE_CD NOT LIKE 'D%' -- 제외(요청 시 진행(김중선))
AND A.AGENCY_CD LIKE '%' || #{agencyCd} || '%'
AND C.AGENCY_NM LIKE '%' || #{agencyNm} || '%'
AND A.HQ_OFFICE_CD LIKE '%' || #{hqOfficeCd} || '%'
AND B.HQ_OFFICE_NM LIKE '%' || #{hqOfficeNm} || '%'
AND A.STORE_CD LIKE '%' || #{storeCd} || '%'
AND A.STORE_NM LIKE '%' || #{storeNm} || '%'
AND A.SYS_STAT_FG = #{sysStatFg}
AND A.VAN_CD = #{srchVanCd}
ORDER BY A.HQ_OFFICE_CD ASC, A.STORE_CD ASC, A.AGENCY_CD ASC

/* USE : CloseStoreMapper.getStoreCloseExceptList */ SELECT tmsce.HQ_OFFICE_CD , tho.HQ_OFFICE_NM , tmsce.STORE_CD , tms.STORE_NM , tca.AGENCY_NM , tms.VAN_CD , tmsce.REMARK FROM TB_MS_STORE_CLOSE_EXCEPT tmsce , TB_MS_STORE tms , TB_HQ_OFFICE tho , TB_CM_AGENCY tca WHERE tmsce.HQ_OFFICE_CD = tms.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND tmsce.STORE_CD = tms.STORE_CD AND tmsce.HQ_OFFICE_CD = tho.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND tms.AGENCY_CD = tca.AGENCY_CD ORDER BY tmsce.HQ_OFFICE_CD , tmsce.STORE_CD
